name: Avatar Generations
summary: Join the Gaang! Create your own Team Avatar with all your favorite heroes from Avatar: The Last Airbender, and soon Avatars from other generations! The likes of Aang, Katara, Sokka, Toph, Suki and Zuko and the much-loved Appa and Momo, all await you to join the Avatar’s quest to fulfill his destiny, for the first time on mobile.

videos.name: Trailer
videos.title: Avatar Generations | Official Launch Gameplay Trailer - Available NOW on iOS & Android!
